title: "A Culture of Curiosity Can Push Government AI Adoption Forward"
excerpt: "Despite many government leaders recognizing AI as an instrumental tool for future missions, some public servants remain hesitant to take a chance on the technology. Agency leaders can remove hesitancy toward AI tools by rewarding innovators who are willing to take risks and pilot the technology."
